description: Uncertain: possibly from Scots, Back-formation from broccoli.

adjectives.description: brockle (comparative more brockle, superlative most brockle)

entries.meaning: Of food odors: malodorous, flatulent, pungent: smelling of sulfur, hydrogen sulfide, or hydrogen disulfide.
Of animals: variegated, speckled, multicolored; usually used in the phrase brockle-faced.
